content.rendered:
Directed by Abhishek Pathak

Written by Jeethu Joseph. Jeethu Joseph. Aamil Keeyan Khan. Aamil Keeyan Khan. Abhishek Pathak

Cast Ajay Devgn (Vijay Salgaonkar). Akshaye Khanna (IGP Tarun Ahlawat). Tabu (Meera Deshmukh). Shriya Saran (Nandini Salgaonkar). Ishita Dutta (Anju Salgaonkar). Mrunal Jadhav (Anu Salgaonkar). Rajat Kapoor (Mahesh Deshmukh). Kamlesh Sawant (SI Laxmikant Gaitonde). Yogesh Soman (Insp. Vinayak Sawant). Saurabh Shukla (Murad Ali). Nishant Singh (SI Shiv Kulkarni). Neha Joshi (ASI Jenny Thomas). Prathamesh Parab (Jose (as Prathmesh Parab)). Sharad Bhutadiya (Martin Uncle). Samvedna Suwalka (Vijay’s Lawyer (as Samvedana)). Sameer Deshpande (Public Prosecutor). Siddharth Bodke (David Braganza). Ashmita Jaggi (Mary Braganza). Pakshal Jain (Angelo Braganza). Haresh Khatri (Sessions Court Judge). Anil Rasal (Peter – Martin’s Chaiwala). Ramchandran Singh (Savio). Ajeet Singh (Medical College Guard (as Ajeeth Singh)). Ashish Ingle (Gossip Monger at Martin’s). Aamil Keeyan Khan (Gossip Monger at Martin’s). Hemant Punjabi (Gossip Monger at Martin’s). Abhishek Kulkarni (Theatre Manager). Krishna Kotian (Preaching Swami). Alok Verma (Ram). Rahul Bajaj (Yatin). Rose Sardana (Yatin’s Girlfriend). Divyanshu Singh Parihar (Arjun). Vineeth Mv (Tony). Sumali Khaniwale (Psychiatrist (as Sumali)). Shiva Naik (Subhash Salve). Naga Babu (Dy. Superintendent of Police). Shashaank Darne (Cop in the Movie). Kshitiz Punia (Hero in the Movie). Govind (Officer at Martin’s Corner). Rakesh (Officer at Headquarters). Abdul (Cop #2). Akshay Shimpi (Cop #3). Suresh (Cop #3). Swapnil Dhondge (Inspector Purohit). Swapnil Dhongade (Deshpande At Cliff). Arihant Rathore (Purohit at Cliff). Bhupendra Shahi (Labourer at Police Station). Kunal Shukla (Labourer at Police Station). Saurabh Tripathi (Labourer at Police Station). Neha Bhalerao (Forensic Team Member). Joseph (Forensic Team Member). Yash Karpe (Forensic Team Member). Aakash Kumar (Forensic Team Member). Piyush (Forensic Team Member). Prasanna Ketkar (Sr. Insp. Shrikant Prabhu (archive footage)). Gopal (CCTV Guy). Goraksh Babel (Young Sam). Parveen (RDO). Rajiv (Tehsildar). Ashwani Prabhu (Peon). Ravindra (Lodge Manager). Adarsh Swaroop (Journalisit (credit only)). Vanita (DySP Assistant)

Languages Hindi. English

Producers Shiv Chanana. Aditya Chowksey. Sanjeev Joshi. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Abhishek Pathak. Kumar Mangat Pathak. Antony Perumbavoor. Vignesh Shetty. Pragya Singh. Shreya Dev Verma.

Production Panorama Studios
